Lightspeed Systems - Full Time - Bakersfield, CA

User Interface Designer / Front-end Web Developer

Lightspeed Systems is looking for a talented User Interface Designer/Front-end Web Developer to help in creating the user experience for our learning network, My Big Campus (http://mybigcampus.com). You will work with our UI director and team of developers to design and implement outstanding User Interfaces. You should be agile, love creatively building, quickly iterating and releasing great stuff in a casual, creative environment!
